message.content:
We could compute this directly by expanding the squares:

\begin{align*}
252^2 - 248^2 &= (252+248)(252-248) \\
&= (500)(4) \\
&= \boxed{2000}.
\end{align*}

An alternative approach is to take advantage of the difference of squares factorization $a^2-b^2=(a+b)(a-b)$. Since $a^2-b^2$ factors into $(a+b)(a-b)$, $252^2-248^2$ factors into $(252+248)(252-248)$. Then, $(252+248)(252-248)$ simplifies as above to give $\boxed{2000}$.
